title: Nigeria Airways
content:
Can anyone tell me what this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621110150im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nigeria_Aiways2.jpg)
author: Nick Job

comments.content:
This looks like the face that pops up once in a while, and I suggest [Sneakers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621110150/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000009) as an alternate to.

- Lex
